Links & Resources

suggested links and resources for COMP 441

This list contains a variety of information, suggestions, and generally interesting material.

This section will be updated on a weekly basis during the Spring semester.

We are not responsible for the content of external websites, and whilst we try to check the currency of each link, some may no longer work.

If you have any suggestions for additions to this section of the site, please feel free to contact me.
